revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Rosewill |model = RNX-N400 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = LX |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = VYTLP-8616 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8196B; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Lexra RLX |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 330<!-- 330 MHz per [[Realtek/SoC]] --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV160DBTI-70G; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3V28S40ETP-G6; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1A:EF |oui = 00:1A:EF
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = guest |defaultssid = Rosewill-N400LX |defaultssid_regex = ^Rosewill-N400LX$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Loopcomm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/29/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 898745031829 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B003M5LCGQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8191RE; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This is a Loopcomm device.
"LOO0020 Rev:1.2" is silkscreened on the board.
The power adapter included with the device is an ''unbranded'' YHSW-120100U (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.13A max. -> 12VDC 1000mA).
==Links of Interest== [http://www.rosewill.com/Mgnt/Uploads2/AttachmentForProduct/user_manual-rnx-n400lx_v1.3.pdf Manual] <!-- [http://www.rosewill.com/products/1526/ProductDetail_Overview.htm Product page] dead as of 2/11/2013 --> [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=77020 On the DD-WRT forums] (high-res internal pictures, OUI derived from label on back of the PCB) :[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=71960 and again] (says device uses RTL8186P, which makes no sense considering this is an N-class router)
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="external"> File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_unit_angled.JPG|angled shot File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_unit_back_ports.JPG|unit back File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_unit_bottom.JPG|unit bottom File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_unit_label.JPG|label </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="internal" mode="slideshow"> File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_board_top.JPG|board top File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_RTL8196B.JPG|RTL8196B File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_RTL8196B_and_UART.JPG|RTL8196B and its surroundings File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_Flash_and_RAM.JPG|RAM and Flash chips File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_Loopcomm_SSed_text.JPG|Loopcomm board text File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_RTL8191RE.JPG|RTL8191RE Wi-Fi IC File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_board_angled_front_right_view.JPG|board top, angled view 1 File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_board_angled_left_side.JPG|board top, angled view 2 File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_board_top_over_power_SS.JPG|board top, over left side File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_board_bot.JPG|board bottom File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_header_bottom.JPG|bottom of the header File:Rosewill_RNX-N400LX_side_layer_view.JPG|side layer view </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
